name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an upcoming open-world action-adventure game set in the dystopian Night City, developed by CD Projekt Red.

name: Elden Ring
description: Elden Ring is an upcoming action role-playing game developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.

name: Starfield
description: Starfield is an upcoming role-playing game developed by Bethesda Game Studios set in space.

name: God of War: Ragnarok
description: God of War: Ragnarok is an upcoming action-adventure game developed by Santa Monica Studio, a sequel to God of War (2018).

name: Breath of the Wild 2
description: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild 2 is an upcoming action-adventure game developed and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo Switch.
